about.title: About Liftex
about.headline: Built on Expertise, Driven by Experience
about.description: For two generations we've transformed bold architectural ideas into smooth, silent vertical journeys. Whether it's a micro‑lift in a tight shaft or a statement glass capsule soaring through an atrium, Liftex blends precision engineering, rock‑solid safety, and design freedom—so every ride feels as refined as the building around it.

why.headline: Why Liftex?
why.subheading:
Two generations of lift engineers, refining craft since the 1990s.
From micro‑lifts for tight shafts to statement glass panoramics.
EN81‑20/50 compliant, redundant braking, 24 / 7 remote monitoring.

whoWeAre.headline: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description:
Liftex is more than just a company — it's the continuation of a story that started back in the 1990s, when a group of passionate engineers began building a reputation for reliable, high-quality elevator solutions. Today, we're the second generation carrying that legacy forward, with fresh energy, modern thinking, and a deep respect for the values we inherited.
Based in Baghdad, we've grown from a small operation into a trusted name in vertical mobility by focusing on people. For us, every project is about building trust, solving problems, and delivering more than expected.

mission.headline: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that true expertise doesn't just deliver a lift — it improves the entire experience, from the first conversation to long after installation.

leadership.headline: Our Leadership
leadership.description:
Liftex is led by the new generation of a family that's been in this industry for over 30 years. We were raised in this field, learning from the ground up — and now we're bringing a fresh perspective to how elevator services should be done.
We don't just follow the standard way of doing things — we challenge it.

culture.headline: Our Culture
culture.intro: At Liftex, we've always believed that how you do things is just as important as what you do. That's why we operate with a strong set of values that guide every interaction, every design, and every decision:

values.title: Precision & Safety
values.description: We're serious about the technical side. Every detail matters, and safety always comes first.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: No hidden costs, no vague promises. Just clear, honest communication and real commitment.

values.title: Innovation & Luxury
values.description: We help clients think beyond the standard. Whether it's a sleek design or a one-of-a-kind structure, we make elevators that elevate buildings.

values.title: Client-Centric Mindset
values.description: You're not just a client — you're a partner. We make sure the final result reflects your needs, your space, and your taste.

values.title: Respect & Collaboration
values.description: Inside the company, we work like a team. Outside, we treat clients and partners with the respect and attention they deserve.

homeProducts.title: OUR PRODUCTS
homeProducts.headline: Designed for Movement. Built for People.
homeProducts.subheading:
At Liftex, we create lift solutions that blend engineering precision with thoughtful design. Our products include lift solutions for homes, commercial buildings, industrial sites, and service environments.

We work closely with architects, developers, and property owners to match the right product with the right space. We don't stop at installation, every lift we deliver comes with personalised service, technical support, and maintenance options designed for your long-term needs.

products.title: Custom Home Lifts
products.description: Discreet shafts, silent rides, and interiors that match your penthouse palette.

products.title: Micro‑Lift™
products.description: When every centimetre counts: payloads up to 250 kg in shafts bigger than 1100mm wide.

products.title: Luxury Passenger Lifts
products.description: Up to 2,000 kg, 4 m/s. Glass, marble, or titanium‑clad cabins that wow tenants.

products.title: Panoramic Glass Lifts
products.description: 360° views with laminated, low‑iron glass and vibration‑damped frames.

products.title: Heavy‑Duty Freight
products.description: Platform sizes to 5 × 3 m, loads to 5 t. Fork‑friendly thresholds, anti‑slip steel decks.

products.title: Escalators & Moving Walks
products.description: Smooth, silent, energy‑smart. Optional LED balustrades and antiviral handrails.

categories.title: Lifecycle Care
categories.description: Design & BIM integration with your architect's workflow. Off‑site fabrication in controlled environments. Installation & testing by IRATA‑trained technicians. Platinum Maintenance Plans – 2‑hour response, IoT diagnostics. Modernisation – controller swaps, door operators, cabin refits.
